Features.Title: Trust Us Bro, or (TUB coin)
Features.Description: In Webification we use Trust Us Bro or (TUB coin) to faciliate transactions between people and/or create Just Us Bro NFT

Features.Title: Just Us Bro, NFT or (TUBNFT)
Features.Description: Just Us Bro NFT or (TUBNFT for short) is our propratary NFT that you can upload your personal information on the blockchain and you can trade it with fellow Webification users

Features.Title: Powered by Wishful Thinking or WT for short
Features.Description: A programming language that is designed for Web 3

Features.Title: State of the art Databases
Features.Description: Powered by WT our relational databases track everything that you do and try to automate redundant and repetitive tasks
